column3: Hojo is searching for a strapping specimen to help with some heavy lifting.
Place the piles of stones in the designated areas.
There's so many frivolous things in this world. We all obsess ourselves with meaningless trinkets and no one stops to consider important things like terraced paddy fields.
The stones that support each field are in need of constant repair, and yet no one seems to care. It is a tough job for one man alone.
From the look of you I would say you are capable of lifting a stone or two. Would you mind lending me your strength?
I will take care of the repair work itself. I simply need you to move several piles of stones to the south closer to the rice paddies.
Please move those piles of stones to the south closer to the rice paddies.
Now begins the hard work. One does not simply pile the stones aimlessly─there is a special technique that must be employed.
I had been training an apprentice, but they were conscripted by that blasted imperial army. Not a day goes by that I do not long for their return.
Ah, but there I go sharing my entire life story with a total stranger yet again! Here is your reward.
